definition: variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to

sentences.chinese: 左外鋒，17歲就爲曼聯初次登場。

sentences.english: When you share a page, you can designate users as viewers or editors.
sentences.chinese: 在共享頁面時，您可以將用戶指定爲查看者或編輯者。

sentences.english: Carnitine is a nutrient that helps the body turn fat into energy.
sentences.chinese: 肉鹼是一種營養，幫助人體脂肪轉化爲能量。

sentences.english: Dr Kraabel began as an editor with the Edanz Group in 2008.
sentences.chinese: 2008年開始爲理文編輯工作，擔任編輯。

sentences.english: I closed the window. I combed his long, black hair from his forehead.
sentences.chinese: 我關上窗，爲他梳理了額頭長長的黑髮。

sentences.english: Even as Abraham believed God, and it was accounted to him for righteousness.
sentences.chinese: 正如，亞伯拉罕信神，這就算爲他的義。

sentences.english: The cost of living figures out at $300。

sentences.chinese: 我爲這件事感到真抱歉，魚啊。

sentences.english: How long would it take to assemble a team for a project like this?
sentences.chinese: 爲這樣一個計劃調集一個小組的人需要多長時間？

sentences.english: It is really a nonclassical communication system.
sentences.chinese: 該系統爲一非古典通信系統。

sentences.english: A number of investigators have used the fluorescent-antibody (FA) technique for Salmonella detection.
sentences.chinese: 因此，沙門氏菌檢測的熒光抗體技術爲能被廣範應用。

sentences.english: Pray for the government to halt its campaign of targeting Christians .
sentences.chinese: 禱告政府會停止以基督徒爲箭靶的活動。

sentences.english: He was always excited by his life and busy with where it was going.
sentences.chinese: 他總是爲他的生活而興奮，忙着它要去的地方。

sentences.english: I was a Teacher for America Corp member and I now work for TFA.
sentences.chinese: 我是爲美國而教的成員，現在爲組織工作。

sentences.english: I was a Teacher for America Corp member and I now work for TFA.
sentences.chinese: 我是爲美國而教的成員，現在爲組織工作。

sentences.english: Mr Charles was elected (the) chairman of the municipal education committee.
sentences.chinese: 查爾斯當選爲先生市教育委員會主任委員。

definition: as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)
because of/for/to
at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at
surname Ying
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to think (i.e. to take it to be true that ...) (Usually there is an implication that the notion is mistaken – except when expressing one's own current opinion.)
real/true/honest/really/solid/fruit/seed/definitely
(conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items
o'clock/time/when/hour/season/period
surname Shi
this/these/(commonly pr. [zhei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing)
although/even though
to fit/balanced/suitable
to weigh/to state/to name/name/appellation/to praise
variant of 秤[cheng4]/steelyard
difficult (to...)/problem/difficulty/difficult/not good
disaster/distress/to scold
artificial/man-made/having human cause or origin/human attempt or effort
to select/to choose/to pick over/to pick out/to differentiate/to eliminate/also pr. [zhai2]
mistake/error/to miss/to harm/to delay/to neglect/mistakenly
surname Ji
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
to persuade
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
